metadata.title: CVE-2017-11608 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There is a heap-based buffer over-read in the Sass::Prelexer::re_linebreak function in lexer.cpp in LibSass 3.4.5. A crafted input will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libsass package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.8-1').
